brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts the DCE router, R1, connected to the DTE router, R2. The show interfaces command is issued on R1 The following line is highlighted in the show interfaces output.

R1# show interfaces s0/0/1
Encapsulation PPP

The show interfaces command is issued on R2. The following line is highlighted in the show interfaces output.

R2# show interfaces s0/0/1
Encapsulation PPP
